title: What was happening on Murrayville Road near Candlewood Drive around 6:00 p.m. on Wednesday 11/4 that required at a fire truck and least 5 law enforcement officers with flashing lights?  There was also an officer with weapon drawn in the Courtney Pines neighborhood around the same time.  There has been nothing in the news.
text: Hello. Thanks for contacting us. There was a death at that location, but it turned out to be a suicide. Routinely, we don't report suicides as news.
